title_text: "Print from Le Globe Trotter titled ""Une Scene Malaise Avec Toute Sa Troupe
subject_terms_1: This is a coloured print depicting a group of people captured to be facing the audience. They are poised, and are either seated or standing.  Orientalism  folk costume
subject_terms_2: travel sketches  Periodicals Publishing Orientalism  Exoticism in art  Colour prints  Malays (Asian people)  Singapore  Ethnic costume
